title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4100.2 - Hours for public inspection of records; records access officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4100.2 - Hours for public inspection of records; records access officer

State Regulations

Public access to the records and files of the commission may
be had by applying at said office any week day between 10 a.m. and 4 p.m. Commissioner William E. Hogan is designated as the public records officer of
the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4100.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
